name: Dale Crover
description: '''Dale Crover''' (born October 23, 1967) is an American [[Rock and roll|rock]] musician. Crover is best known as the drummer for [[Melvins]] and has also been the drummer for [[Men of Porn]], [[Shrinebuilder]], [[Crystal Fairy (band)|Crystal Fairy]] and, for a brief time, [[Nirvana (band)|Nirvana]]. He is also guitarist and vocalist for [[Altamont (band)|Altamont]]. He has toured with [[Fantômas (band)|Fantômas]] (filling in for [[Dave Lombardo]]), [[Off!]], and [[Redd Kross]]. In 2016, [[Rolling Stone]] listed him as the 69th greatest drummer of all time.
